timeline.bodyText: Made package-private since the unit test class will access this field.
timeline.author: vcolin7
vcolin7

timeline.message: Changed UserAgentInterceptor to show empty strings instead of 'null' when passed a null value for sdkName or sdkVersion.
Fixed bug where, when the User-Agent header is already populated, we would not update its value but add a new entry for it in the request instead.
Modified the UserAgentInterceptor to trim and truncate the user-provided applicationId as specified in the design guidelines.
